page.title: 06FACILITIES IN HOLT-A
page.content: {BELLIS BROTHERS-THE FARM SHOP. BELLIS BROS.IS THE NAME OF THE SHOP WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE WREXHAM ROAD. IT SELLS FRUIT SUCH AS APPLES,ORANGES, AND LOTS OF OTHER FRUITS.IT ALSO SELLS A WIDE RANGE OF VEGETABLES e.g CARROTS,CAULIFLOWER,LETTUCE,POTATOES, etc.DURING THE SUMMER SEASON YOU CAN PICK YOUR OWN FRUIT AND VEGETABLES e.g STRAWBERRIES,GOOSEBERRIES,RUNNER BEANS,PEAS,etc FROM THEIR FIELDS AT THE REAR OF THE SHOP.THEY ARE OPEN ALL YEAR ROUND SELLING THEIR OWN PRODUCE. {CASTLE CAFE. THE CASTLE CAFE IS ON CASTLE STREET.IT HAS BED & BREAKFAST AND IS ALSO LICENSED TO SELL WINES & SPIRITS.IT ALSO SELLS SNACK FOOD,A VARIETY OF HOT & COLD MEALS AND BEVERAGE{ {W.SLAWSON-BETTING OFFICE. THE BETTING OFFICE IS ON CASTLE STREET.IT IS NEXT DOOR TO THE CASTLE
